name: Close Quarters (CookingLapin)
description:
In Close Quarter, you play as John, an ex-hitman on a mission to recover his beloved dog Wick from the clutches of a ruthless gangster. As you fight your way through an intense elevator showdown, use your skills and strategic thinking to take down waves of enemies and emerge victorious. With minimalist controls and fast-paced gameplay, Close Quarter offers an exciting and challenging fighting experience. Can you make it to the top and bring Wick home safely in this thrilling 2D action game?

How to play:

Mouse only:

Right-click to attack on the right side.

Left-click to attack on the left side.

Jam version:

The game was made for the Zeno Jam 6 hosted by Zeno. The theme was "Going up". All of the action happens in an elevator going up toward John's stolen dog.

Credits:

Characters inspired by https://penusbmic.itch.io/super-ginger-hero

Tremendous help by Lilikoiboy to polish the art
